ABOUT

Lunar is a rolling-release, source-based Linux distribution for advanced users.

You begin by installing the lunar core, a minimal command-line only system, with the tools to build the full experience you want. From there, you create your own customized system built entirely from source code.

Stable

We use up-to-date software with very little changes from upstream.
